description: Simple, intuitive and logical every-day-usage additions to the Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0 SP1 and newer. Follows the same namespace structure already found in the .NET Framework.
releaseNotes:
This is a minor release with some nice additions.
The following work was completed for this release:

- New sealed class, EndpointInputParser, in the Cuemon.ServiceModel namespace that provides methods and properties for parsing HTTP endpoints
- New interface, IHttpMessageBody, in the Cuemon.ServiceModel namespace that represents the entity-body of an HTTP message

- Improved the TypeUtility class in the Cuemon namespace in the IsComplex method; supplemental check for default constructor
- Improved the Validator class in the Cuemon namespace with several new overloaded methods; ThrowIfEnum<TEnum>, ThrowIfNotEnum<TEnum>, ThrowIfEnumType<TEnum>, ThrowIfNotEnumType<TEnum>
- Improved the EnumUtility class in the Cuemon namespace with one new overloaded methods; IsStringOf<TEnum>
- Improved the StringUtility class in the Cuemon namespace with two new overloaded methods; TryParseBase64
- Improved the StringDataReader class in the Cuemon.Data namespace with one new method; Contains

- Refactored the DataPair, DataPairCollection and DataPairDictionary class in the Cuemon namespace to support a custom Type definition
- Refactored the CountdownEvent class in the Cuemon.Threading namespace to use auto-properties and added extra state check of disposable dependant
- Refactored the Endpoint class in the Cuemon.ServiceModel namespace to be more resilient and less complex hence more readable
- Refactored the EndpointModule class in the Cuemon.ServiceModel namespace to be more resilient and readable
summary: A free and flexible assembly package, built to extend and boost your codebelt - providing vast ways of possibilities for all breeds of coders, programmers, developers and the likes thereof.
title: Cuemon .NET Framework
